meanings.definition: A frame or trestle for supporting wood being sawed.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter set up the sawhorses to hold the long plank steady.
meanings.sent2: I need to use the sawhorses to cut this piece of wood.
meanings.sent3: The sawhorses decided to have a race to see who could hold the wood the longest.
meanings.sent4: The sawhorses stood like loyal soldiers, supporting the wooden beam with unwavering strength.
meanings.sent5: The sawhorses creaked under the weight of the heavy timber, but they never faltered in their duty.

meanings.definition: A pair of supports used to hold a piece of wood off the ground for cutting.
meanings.sent1: Dad asked me to fetch the sawhorses so he could start sawing the wood.
meanings.sent2: The sawhorses are essential for woodworking projects in the garage.
meanings.sent3: The sawhorses were so excited to finally be useful after months of just standing around.
meanings.sent4: The sawhorses lifted the wooden plank like a pair of gentle giants, ready for the saw.
meanings.sent5: The sawhorses formed a sturdy bridge for the wood to rest on, ready to be cut into shape.
